text: Experts say more ‘dark days’ are ahead for the Russian ruble as the invasion of Ukraine continues
title: G20 Summit Protests Keep Melania Trump From Leaving Hotel

meta_data.description: First Lady Melania Trump is reportedly trapped in her hotel room in Hamburg amid ongoing protests for the G20 Summit.
